product_name: GoLite TraveLite Carry-on Wheeled Luggage - 22" - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Isn't it great when your adventure necessities can fit in the overhead bin? The GoLite TraveLite Carry-on 22" Wheeled Luggage is your ticket to easy, lightweight, minimalist travel. Built of backpack fabric that's lightweight yet strong; reinforced at key points. Oversize, smooth-rolling wheels; sturdy telescoping handle. Book-style main opening has internal divider panels. External-zip, padded pocket for a laptop up to 17 in. External zippered organization pocket. External file pocket for easy access to magazines or documents. 2 full-length internal pockets; internal compression straps. Padded grab handles on top and side. GoLite TraveLite Carry-on 22" Wheeled Luggage has an integrated luggage tag. This item meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines (size not to exceed 45 linear inches when adding L+W+H; this is subject to change, so check with your airline). Closeout.
short_description: Isn't it great when your adventure necessities can fit in the overhead bin? The GoLite TraveLite Carry-on 22" Wheeled Luggage is your ticket to easy, lightweight, minimalist travel.
